game.name: Good puzzle: Music
game.shortDescription: This puzzle type puzzle game. In the game, you need to collect a full-fledged image from small pieces that are randomly scattered across the screen. The images contain a variety of images with a musical direction
game.shortDescriptionEn: This puzzle type puzzle game. In the game, you need to collect a full-fledged image from small pieces that are randomly scattered across the screen. The images contain a variety of images with a musical direction
